title: Web Development
content: I've been creating websites for a living for over a decade

sections.title: Project Overview
sections.content: Synesthesia is a music player that visualizes music in a 3D space. The user can explore the music in a 3D environment and interact with the music in a way that is not possible with traditional music players.

sections.title: Technologies
sections.content: Synesthesia is built with React, Three.js, and Web Audio API.
